name: 楊韻華
objective:
本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：
1.　　建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。
2.　　學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。
3.　　以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。
4.　　以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
schedule:
Wk1-2: Orientation 
Wk 3-4: Business Meeting in English
Wk 5: Practice Biz Meeting
Wk 6-7; Making a Presentation in English 
Wk 8: Student Presentation 
Wk 9 Midterm
Wk 10-11: A Successful Sales Call 
Wk 12-13: Receiving Foreign Guests
Wk 14-15: Bargaining in English
Wk 16-17: Singing a Contract
Wk 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1) Atendance 30% (Each unexcused absence consitute a penalty of 5% semester grade deduction.)
2) In-Class Oral Practice and Participation 20%
3) Midterm & Final 40%
4) Final Portfolio 10% (The portfolio shall comprise class notes and individual oral practice recordings.)
materials: LIVE ABC's "Practical English for Business Situation: Biz TAlk"
